name: Avoid SQL queries with implicit conversions in the WHERE clause
associatedValueName: Name of the column (first column involved in a type conversion)
description: This metric retrieves all SQL artifacts with a query using implicit type conversion.
output:
Associated to each artifact with violations, the Quality Rule provides: 
Name of the column (first column involved in a type conversion).
rationale: A query using implicit type conversion usually introduces performance issues into an application as well as classical data conversion issues such as date to string conversion.
total: Number of SQL artifacts using tables
alternativeName: Avoid SQL queries with implicit conversions in the WHERE clause

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
MIPS-Reduction - focus on data access efficiency
